headline: Putting it all together, each row of the CSV will have these four fields separated by semicolons. The first row is the header: "headline"
author: author
content: content. Then each subsequent row represents one article with its respective details.

headline: New Technology Breakthrough
author: John Doe
content: In a significant advancement, researchers have developed a groundbreaking technology that promises to transform various sectors. This innovation addresses long-standing challenges and opens new possibilities for future developments.
